Package com.azure.storage.blob

Package containing the classes for BlobServiceClient.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountSASPermission
    This is a helper class to construct a string representing the permissions granted by an AccountSAS.
    AccountSASResourceType
    This is a helper class to construct a string representing the resources accessible by an AccountSAS.
    AccountSASService
    This is a helper class to construct a string representing the services accessible by an AccountSAS.
    AppendBlobAsyncClient
    Client to an append blob.
    AppendBlobClient
    Client to an append blob.
    BlobAsyncClient
    Client to a blob of any type: block, append, or page.
    BlobClient
    Client to a blob of any type: block, append, or page.
    BlobClientBuilder
    This class provides a fluent builder API to help aid the configuration and instantiation Storage Blob clients.
    BlobInputStream
    Provides an input stream to read a given blob resource.
    BlobOutputStream  
    BlobProperties  
    BlobSASPermission
    This is a helper class to construct a string representing the permissions granted by a ServiceSAS to a blob.
    BlobServiceAsyncClient
    Client to a storage account.
    BlobServiceClient
    Client to a storage account.
    BlobServiceClientBuilder
    Fluent BlobServiceClientBuilder for instantiating a BlobServiceClient or BlobServiceAsyncClient using BlobServiceClientBuilder.buildClient() or BlobServiceClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    BlockBlobAsyncClient
    Client to a block blob.
    BlockBlobClient
    Client to a block blob.
    ContainerAsyncClient
    Client to a container.
    ContainerClient
    Client to a container.
    ContainerClientBuilder
    Fluent ContainerClientBuilder for instantiating a ContainerClient or ContainerAsyncClient using ContainerClientBuilder.buildClient() or ContainerClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    ContainerProperties  
    ContainerSASPermission
    This is a helper class to construct a string representing the permissions granted by a ServiceSAS to a container.
    DownloadAsyncResponse
    DownloadAsyncResponse wraps the protocol-layer response from BlobAsyncClient.download(BlobRange, ReliableDownloadOptions, BlobAccessConditions, boolean) to automatically retry failed reads from the body as appropriate.
    DownloadResponse  
    HTTPGetterInfo
    HTTPGetterInfo is a passed to the getter function of a reliable download to specify parameters needed for the GET request.
    IPRange
    This type specifies a continuous range of IP addresses.
    PageBlobAsyncClient
    Client to a page blob.
    PageBlobClient
    Client to a page blob.
    SASQueryParameters
    Represents the components that make up an Azure Storage SAS' query parameters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SASProtocol
    Specifies the set of possible permissions for a shared access signature protocol.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StorageException
    A StorageException is thrown whenever Azure Storage successfully returns an error code that is not 200-level.
    UnexpectedLengthException
    This exception class represents an error when the specified input length doesn't match the data length.

Package com.azure.storage.blob Description

Package containing the classes for BlobServiceClient.
